body.div:
namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa
evaṃ me sutaṃ ekaṃ samayaṃ bha
gavā ukaṭhāyaṃ viharati subhaggavane sālasaṃjamūle tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhu āmantesi
bhikkhavo ti bhaddante ti te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosuṃ bhagavā etadavoca sabbadhammamūlapari
yāyaṃ vo bhikkhave desissāmi taṃ suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasī karotha bhāsissāmī ti
evaṃ bhante ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosuṃ bhagavā etadavoca
itha bhikkhave assu
tavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinito
sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinito patha
vi pathavīto saññānāti pathavi pathavito saññatvā pathavī maññati pathaviyā maññati patha
vito maññati pathavī meti maññati pathavī abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu sapariññātaṃ
tassā ti vadāmi āpaṃ āpato saññānāti āpaṃ āpato saññatvā āpaṃ maññati so
āpasmiṃ maññati āpato maññati āpaṃ meti maññati āpaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu
apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi tejaṃ tejato saññānāti tejaṃ tejato saṃññatvā
tejaṃ maññati tejasmi maññati tejato maññati tejaṃ meti maññati tejaṃ abhinandati
taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi vāyaṃ vāyato saññānāti vāyaṃ
vāyato saṃññatvā vāyaṃ maññati vāyasmi maññati vāyato maññati vāyaṃ meti ma
ññati vāyaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu sapariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
bhūte bhūta
to saññānāti bhūte bhūtato saṃññatvā bhūte maññati bhūtesu maññati bhū
tato maññati bhūte meti maññati bhūte abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apari
ññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi deve devato saññānāti deve devato saṃññatvā devaṃ maññati devesu maññati devato maññati deve meti maññati deve ābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
pajāpati pajāpatito asaññānāti pajāpati pajāpatito saṃññatvā pajāpati maññati pajāpatismi maññati pajāpatito maññati pajāpati meti maññati pajāpatī abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti va
dāmi brahmaṃ brahmato saṃjānāti brahmaṃ brahmato saṃññatvā brahmaṃ maññati brahmasmi maññati brahmato maññati brahmaṃ meti maññati brahmaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi ābhassare ābhassarato saññānāti ā
bhāssare ābhassarato saṃñatvā ābhassaresu maññati ābhassaresu maññati ābhassarato maññati ābhassare meti maññati ābhassare meti abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apari
ññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmīti subhakiṇhe subhakiṇhato saññānāti subhakiṇhe subhakiṇhato saṃñatvā subhakiṇe maññati subhakiṇhesu maññati subhakiṇhato maññati subhakiṇhe meti
maññati subhakiṇhe abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi vehabbale vehabbalato saññānāti vehabbale vehabbalato saṃñatvā vehabbale maññati vehappalesu maññati
vehabbalato maññati vehabbale meti maññati vehabbale abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi abhibhuṃ abhibhūto saññānāti abhibhuṃ abhibhūto saṃñatvā ābhibhuṃ maññati abhibhū
smi maññati abhibhūto maññati abhibhuṃ meti maññati abhibhuṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanato saññānāti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ
ākāsānañcāyatanato saññatvā ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ maññati ākāsānañcāyatanasmi maññati ākāsānañcāyatanato maññati ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ meti maññati ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ abhinandatī
kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanato saññānāti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanato saṃñatvā viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ maññati viññāṇañcāyatanasmi maññati viññāṇañcāyatana
to maññati viññāṇañcā yatanaṃ meti maññati viññānañcāyatanaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi ākiñcaññāyatanato saññānāti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanato saṃñña
tvā ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ maññati ākiñcaññāyatanasmi maññati ākiñcaññāyatanato maññati ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ meti maññati ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanato saññā nāti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanato saṃñatvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ maññati
nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasmi maññati nevasaññānāsaññāyatanato maññati nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ meti maññati nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu
apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
diṭhaṃ diṭhato saññānāti diṭhaṃ diṭhato saṃñatvā diṭhaṃ maññati diṭhasmi maññati diṭhato maññati diṭhaṃ meti maññati diṭhaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi sutaṃ su
tako saṃñānāti sutaṃ sutato saṃññatvā sutaṃ maññati sutasmi maññati sutato maññati sutaṃ meti maññati sutaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi mutaṃ mutato saññānā
ti mūtaṃ mūtato saṃññatvā mūtaṃ maññati mutasmi maññati mutato maññati mūtaṃ meti maññati mūtaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmiti viññātaṃ viññātato saññānāti viññātaṃ vi
viññātato saṃñatvā taṃ maññati viññātasmi maññati viññātato maññati viññātaṃ meti maññati viññātaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
ekatthaṃ ekatthato saññānā
ti ekattaṃ ekattato saṃññatvā ekattaṃ maññati ekattasmi maññati ekattato maññati ekattaṃ meti maññati ekattaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi sappaṃ sappato saññānā nānattaṃ nāna
ttato sañjānāti nānattaṃ nānattato saṃññatvā nānattaṃ maññati nānattasmi maññati nānattato maññati nānattaṃ meti maññati nānattaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi sappaṃ sappato saññānāti sa
bbaṃ sabbato saṃñatvā sappaṃ maññati sappsmi maññati sabbato maññati sabbaṃ meti maññati sabbaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi nibbānaṃ nippānato saññānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato saṃññatvā nibbānaṃ maññati nibbānasmi
maññati nibbānato maññati nibbānaṃ meti maññati nibbānaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi puthujjanāvasenapatha na paṭhamanayabhummiparicchedo niṭhito
yopi
so bhikkhave bhikkhu sekkho abbatthamānaso anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ patthayamāno viharati sopi pathavito abhijānāti pathavī pathavīto abhiññāya pathavī mā maññi pathavī
yā mā maññi pathavīto mā maññi pathavi mati mā maññi pathavī mābhinandi taṃ kissa hetu pariññeyyaṃ tassā ti vadāmi ...la... āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpati brahmaṃ ābhāssare subha
kiṇhe vehabbale abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ diṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbā
nato abhiññāya nibbānaṃ mā maññati nibbānasmi mā maññi nibbānato mā maññi nibbānaṃ māabhinandi taṃ kissa hetuṃ pariññeyyaṃ tassā ti vadāmi sekhavasena dutiyanayabhummiparicchedo niṭhito
yo
pi so bhikkhave bhikkhu arahaṃ khiṇāsavo vutitavā katakaraṇiyo ohitābhāvo anuppattasadatto parikhiṇabhavasaṃyojanā sammadaññā vimutto sopi pathaviṃ pathavito abhijānāti pathavī pathavito abhiññāya pathavī na mañña
ti pathavīyā na maññati pathavīto na maññati pathavī meti na maññati pathavī nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu pariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi ...la... āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpati brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehabphale
abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ dippaṃṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiññāya nibbānaṃ na ma
ññati nibbānasmi na maññati nibbānato na maññati nibbānaṃ meti na maññati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu pariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi khiṇāsavavasena tatiyanayabhummiparicchedo niṭhito
yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu ārahaṃ khiṇāsavo vusitavā katakara
ṇiyo ohitabhāro anuppatthasadatto parikkhiṇābhavasaṃyojano sammadaññā vimutto sopi pathavī pathavito abhijānāti pathavī pathavito abhiññāya pathavī na maññati pathavīyā na
maññati pathavīto na maññati pathavī meti na maññati pathavī nāabhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā rāgassa vitarāgattā ...la... āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpati brahmaṃ ābhassa
re subhakiṇhe vehabbale abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññānañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ diṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbā
nato abhiññāya nibbānaṃ na maññati nabbānasmi na maññati nibbānato na maññati nibbānaṃ meti na maññati nibbānaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā rāgassa vitarāgattā khiṇāsavavasena catutthanayabhummiparicche
do niṭhito
yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu arahaṃ khiṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇiyo ohitabhāro anuttaro anuppattasadattho parikkhiṇaṃbhavasaṃyojano sammadaññā vimutto sopi patha
vī pathavito abhijānāti pathavī pathavīto abhiññāya pathavī na maññati pathavīyā na maññati pathavito na maññati pathavī meti na maññati pathavī nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā dosassa vitadosattā ...la...
āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpati brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññānañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ diṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ eka
ttaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nippānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiññāya nippānaṃ na maññati nibbānasmi na maññati nibbānato na maññati nibbānaṃ meti na maññati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā dosassa vitadosattā khiṇāsavavasena pañcamanayabhummipari
cchedo niṭhito
yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu arahaṃ khiṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇiyo ohitabhāvo anuppattasadattho parikkhiṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññā vimutto sopi pathavi pathavi
to abhijānāti pathavī pathavīto abhiññāya pathavī na maññati pathavīyā na maññati pathavīto na maññati pathavī meti na maññati pathavī meti na maññati pathavī nābhinandati taṃ kissa he
tu khayā mohassa vitamohattā ...la... āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpati brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehabbale abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ
ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ diṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiññāya nibbānaṃ
na maññati nibbānasmi na maññati nibbānato na maññati nibbānaṃ meti na maññati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā mohassa vitamohattā khiṇāsavavasena chaṭṭhanayabhummiparicchedo niṭhito
tathāgato bhikkhave arahaṃ sammāsambuddho pathavī pathavīto abhijānāti pathavī pathavīto abhiññāya pathavī na maññati pathavīyā na maññati pathavīto na maññati pathavī meti na maññati pa
thavī nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu pariññātantaṃ tathāgatassā ti vadāmi ...la... āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpati brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehabbale abhibhuṃ ākā
sānañcāyatanaṃ viññānañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ diṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiññāya nibbānaṃ na maññati nibbānasmi na maññati nibbānato na
to na maññati nibbānaṃ meti na maññati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetuṃ pariññātataṃ tathāgatassā ti vadāmi satthuvasena sattamanayabhummiparicchedo niṭhito
tathāgatopi bhikkhave arahaṃ
sammāsambuddho pathavī pathavito abhijānāti pathavi pathavīto abhiññāya pathavī na maññati pathavīyā na maññati pathavito na maññati pathavī meti na maññati pathavī nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu nani dukkhassa mūlanti iti vidi
tvā bhavā jāti bhūtassa jarāmaraṇanti tasmā tiha bhikkhave tathāgato sabbaso taṇhānaṃ khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā na paṭinisaggā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhi abhisambuddho ti vadāmi ...la... āpaṃ tejaṃ vā
yaṃ bhūte deve pajāpati brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehabbale abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ diṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññā
taṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibpānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiññāya nibbānaṃ na maññati nibbānasmi na maññati nibbānato na maññati nibbānaṃ meti na maññati ni
bbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu nandi dukkhassa mūlanti viditvā bhavā jāti bhūtassa jarāmaraṇanti tasmā tiha bhikkhave tathāgato sabbaso taṇhānaṃ khayā virāgā nirodhā jāgā paṭinissaggā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhi abhi
sambuddho ti vadāmi ti satthuvasena atthaṭhanayabhummiparicchedo idamavoca bhagavā na te bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandati mūlapariyāyasuttataṃ niṭhitaṃ paṭhamaṃ
